title: AdiHaus
content:
Hi.  
I Looking information about AdiHaus font. I think that it is a version of DIN created by Adidas.  
Thanks

marcos
author: marcosdopico

comments.content: It is a FontShop Corporate Font, based on FF DIN und ITC Avant Garde Gothic Medium.

Plazm also claims to have done it. I don't know. You decide : )  
 [http://www.plazm.com/design/brand/adihaus](http://web.archive.org/web/20150311184158/http:/www.plazm.com/design/brand/adihaus "http://www.plazm.com/design/brand/adihaus")
